about_the_game:
Welcome to the city of N, shrouded in many mysteries and riddles. Here you will have to fight for resources, participate in gang fights, rob and kill to survive. Find out what happened in this city, who doomed him to perdition.. Will you be able to solve his most important secret and survive in the fight for the most valuable resource..

Gameplay


The gameplay provides complete freedom of movement in the game world. Explore areas of the city, chat with minor characters or arrange fights with them. Search the territory in search of weapons, fight with local gangs and complete story tasks. At your disposal is a diverse arsenal of cold and firearms..

As the game progresses, the player will be haunted by hunger and thirst. Look for food, energy and water to maintain health. You have to fight for the right to survive in this harsh place.

A plot

You have to live 2 weeks in a doomed city in the body of a squirrel. What can you do in these 2 weeks: smash up a computer club, rob a hardware store, disrupt a deal at the port or make friends with sectarians? Or maybe you would like to spend these 2 weeks in a clearing by the fire, listening to the stories of other squirrels?

Choose exactly how to pass the plot: forgive the traitor or deal with him, negotiate peacefully or use a knife, help the sectarians who are in the cemetery, or kill everyone – further actions depend on the player's choice.

Main features of the game


  • A dystopian RPG, the main characters of which are squirrels;
  • A well-thought-out concept of the game world, with its own features and laws;
  • An open world filled with characters with their own story;
  • A plot full of riddles and unexpected twists.
